org.grails.plugin.vaadin
[Groovy] Class VaadinClasses

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.plugin.vaadin.VaadinClasses

class VaadinClasses

Constructs a list of Vaadin Classes and Artefacts from the specified GrailsApplication.

A class is considered a Vaadin Class if it:

  • Has 'vaadin' in the package name of itself, or any of its superclasses.
  • Is a Vaadin Artefact (see below)

A class is considered a Vaadin Artefact if it:

  • Has 'VaadinController' at the end of the class name.
Authors:
Francis McKenzie

Method Detail

getAllClasses

java.util.List getAllClasses()
Get all Vaadin classes.
Returns:
List of Vaadin classes in the Grails Application.

getArtefactByLogicalPropertyName

VaadinClass getArtefactByLogicalPropertyName(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String propertyName)
Look up a Vaadin Artefact by logical property name. E.g. find the 'BookVaadinController' class by specifying property name 'book' and type 'controller'
Parameters:
type - The artefact type, e.g. 'controller'
propertyName - The logical property name, e.g. 'book'
Returns:
The Vaadin artefact for the specified type and name

getArtefacts

java.util.List getArtefacts(java.lang.String type)
Get the list of Vaadin Artefacts for the specified type.
Parameters:
type - E.g. 'controller'
Returns:
List of Vaadin Artefacts for the specified type in the Grails Application.

isVaadinArtefact

static boolean isVaadinArtefact(java.lang.Class clazz)
Checks if a class qualifies as a Vaadin artefact (see description at top). Used internally when initially creating the list of of Vaadin artefacts.
Parameters:
clazz - The candidate class
Returns:
true if the specified class is considered a Vaadin artefact

isVaadinClass

static boolean isVaadinClass(java.lang.Class clazz)
Checks if a class qualifies as a Vaadin class (see description at top). Used internally when initially creating the list of of Vaadin classes.

Note that this method has to be static, as it is used by the ArtefactHandler that monitors changes to Vaadin Artefacts.

Parameters:
clazz - The candidate class
Returns:
true if the specified class is considered a Vaadin class

registerVaadinArtefact

protected java.lang.Object registerVaadinArtefact(java.lang.Class clazz)
Adds specified class to artefact list, if it is a Vaadin artefact.
Parameters:
clazz - The candidate class

registerVaadinClass

protected java.lang.Object registerVaadinClass(java.lang.Class clazz)
Adds specified class to class list, if it is a Vaadin class.
Parameters:
clazz - The candidate class
